dreisoft.tresos.datamodel2.api.model.expr

Class MFrom

  • java.lang.Object
    • dreisoft.tresos.datamodel2.api.model.expr.AbstractMExpr
      • dreisoft.tresos.datamodel2.api.model.expr.MFrom
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IMExpr

    public class MFrom
extends AbstractMExpr
    Return all contexts reachable via path. E.g.: 
     ctxt.getAll(new getFrom("/My/Path", getChild()));
    returns all child nodes of the node referenced by the path "/My/Path".

    Copyright (C) Elektrobit Automotive GmbH - All rights reserved

    Since:
    2008.a

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class dreisoft.tresos.datamodel2.api.model.expr.AbstractMExpr

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MFrom(java.lang.String path)
      Returns all contexts reachable by the named path calculated from the current contexts.
      MFrom(java.lang.String path, DCtxt... ctxts)
      Returns all contexts that are reachable from the handed in contexts via path.
      MFrom(java.lang.String path, IMExpr... exprs)
      Dereferences handed in contexts by path and hands them to the given expressions
      MFrom(java.lang.String path, IMExpr expr)
      Dereferences handed in contexts by path and hands them to the given expression
      MFrom(java.lang.String path, IMExpr expr, DCtxt... ctxts)
      Fetches all contexts that are reachable from the given contexts via path and hands them to the given expression
